column5: I was up in canada for a wedding and i was able to get out with my dad to go fishing for a few hours on a kawartha lake. He has never caught a musky before so it was my goal to put him onto a nice fish. After an hours fishing he was able to land this little guy. It was really exciting seeing him reel in the fish.  We let the fish go.  Picked her up on a oversized black and orange spinner bait.
Good job pops. Two thumbs up.
That's very cool Matt. A time to cherish.
Great stuff!!!  Theys sure do like that black and orange combo  Maureen
Orange and black worked for me on the weekend as well!  Congrats to your dad on his first!
Great stuff Matt.  Now i'm off to buy some more black and orange stuff (when does the buying stop!)
That's awesome Matt, congrats to your Dad, the 1st one is always the most memorable !!  Orange & black for musky ????.....hmmmmm, musta been a fluke
Congrats to your dad. He sure looks happy!
Awesome, your dad will remember that day for ever.
